website_summaries.verdict: Same good quality as other Britax with fewer bells and whistles.
pros: 5-point harness is sturdy and easy to use
Easy to tighten and loosen straps
Buttons make it simple to tighten and release your child from this seat
Steel frame and safe cell impact safety build
Cover is easy to remove and clean
cons: The straps on this Britax have to be manually threaded to adjust height

customer_reviews.title: Alway trusted car seats
customer_reviews.text: We as a family have used Britax car seats for all 3 of our children. Needed a second for other vehicle and this car seat was a upgraded style of original car seat. I have to say the steel reinforcement frame is great improvement over plastic frame of older one, but I do like the cover of older one better comfort wise, but the new style is much easier to clean though, this feels more plastic. Overall very happy with car seat, and always trusted Britax to keep our children safe in cars, Praying we never have to rely on this to keep kids safe.
customer_reviews.author: Btim3

customer_reviews.title: When this car seat camr we put our 10 month old in it and he looked very comfortable. There's a lot of room to grow and ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Britax infant car seat and stroller for our current (2nd) baby but he's growing out of it so that one will be going to our 3rd baby arriving in a few weeks. When this car seat camr we put our 10 month old in it and he looked very comfortable. There's a lot of room to grow and it has plenty of cushion. The fabric seems east to clean and durable. We'll see how it hold up for the next couple of years between 2 babies. So far we have loved the infant seat and we love this one!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Comparison
customer_reviews.text: Here is a graco booster smallest setting for my 2 year old 25lbs The britax. And the graco marathon sized up to fit my 35lb 5 year old . I love graco for many reasons including the ease of pressing the top button to adjust shoulder straps but the metal framing and ease of latching has me swooning over the britax. My 5 year old is tiny and thin at 35lb barely 3 feet and she could fit into the britax but she was in between sizes for the shoulder straps. My 2 year old looks so snug in the britax. Def wish i splurged and got it when my 5 year old was a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Pl

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to install, use & clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Britax seat I've purchased for my growing family. They consistently have high safety ratings, they're easy to install and easy to use & clean. We'll keep buying Britax until all my kids are out of strollers and car seats!
customer_reviews.author: jame.rame

customer_reviews.title: Great ride!
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice - easy to wipe clean, and his little bottom slides in better, without friction. That sounds weird... But I'm sure moms know what I mean. It looks so comfy, I wish I could ride in it.
customer_reviews.author: beaven

customer_reviews.title: Probably our favorite seat.
customer_reviews.text: Great seat at a great price. We like the Graco seats, but they are so hard to install. So we've turned to the Britax and haven't regretted it. We have one more seat to buy, and it will be the same seat!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Great for tight cars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat if you have a smaller back seat, but still accommodates a big toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent car seat.Easy to install in my vehicle.Good protection for my grand daughter. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Ordered the lighter color since we live in Arizona. Of course since it's polyester my toddler still sweats some in it. But like I said, we live in Arizona. :)
customer_reviews.author: R. Chestnut

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this car seat. Compact enough to fit in my compact car, easy to install from car to car. It’s well made and protects my infant baby. Quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: LFM

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat at a very reasonable price! We had the Britax Marathon for years prior to this one and I really can't tell a difference between the two seats except for the fact that the Marathon cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is amazing. Easy to install and buckle. Bought for second baby as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable for my 2 year old. The only thing I dont like is trying to get the seat belt through the back is a little difficult
customer_reviews.author: niki

customer_reviews.title: Big Girl Car Seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is our family's 4th Britax car seat - mom, dad and grandmother's second! Our three year old loves her "Big Girl" car seat and we do too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Briggs Eagleton

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought as our second car seat. Great for the value. Not many frills, but easy to install and seems safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ello

customer_reviews.title: They are by far the most comfortable and easy to use rear facing infant seats
customer_reviews.text: I have five children and we own two of these car seats! They are by far the most comfortable and easy to use rear facing infant seats. Especially now that we have to keep them facing backwards until they’re too, I highly recommend the seat!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

product_meta.title: Britax Roundabout G4.1 Convertible Car Seat, Luna
product_meta.description:
The Roundabout Convertible Car Seat is a smart choice for keeping your little one safe and sound as you head out on life's travels. SafeCell Impact Protection surrounds your child in safety components that work together to protect well beyond the established federal safety standards. And Complete Side Impact Protection shields your little one in a deep protective shell designed to absorb crash forces and protect from debris. To ensure the right fit the Roundabout comes with a 2-Position Buckle to keep up with your growing child and Plush Foam Padding provides premium comfort at every touch point. Installation is made simple with Easy-On / Easy-Off LATCH Connectors that lock into place with an audible click and are easily released with the push of a button. The Roundabout is designed to keep you worry free and your child safe, comfy and secure for the road ahead.

BRAND STORY
By Britax
feature_bullets: SafeCell Impact Protection is an integrated system of safety components, including an Impact Absorbing Base, Tether and Harness, an Impact Stabilizing Steel Frame, and Complete Side Impact Protection
SafeCell Complete Side Impact Protection surrounds your child in a deep protective shell designed to absorb crash forces and shield your child from debris
Tangle Free, 5 Point Harness prevents the straps from twisting making it easier to load your child into the seat and ensuring a safer ride

3 Recline Positions for your child's comfort and safety.Check that the back angle of the child seat is 30 degree to 45 degree from vertical (not to exceed 45 degree ) when the car is parked on a level surface
Quick Adjust 2 Position Buckle allows you to easily move the buckle outward for a comfortable, secure fit as your child grows

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars32 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
